item.title: Service Providers
item.description: Twig template engine Install Require composer package $ composer require slim/twig-view Then, uncomment the line register Twig Service Provider in bootstrap/app.php Usage All templates is stored in resources/views folder File resource/views/email.html <h1>Dear {{ name|e }},</a> Thanks for using our service :) Have a good time ! Render template $body = app('view')->render('email.html', ['name' => 'KhanhIceTea']); // Or use $this in controller $body = $this->view->render('email.html', ['name' => 'KhanhIceTea']); Eloquent Eloquent is a very good query builder out there.
